questions.describe: Which of the following features can be used to assign different picklist values for different business processes? (Select 1)
AW Computing wants their sales reps to see the sum of the total opportunities on each account that they own. What feature can be used to display this information? (Select 1)
Which of the following features can be used to make a field required? (Select 2)
An admin needs to keep track of all the changes made to the stage, amount, and close date on opportunities. (Select 1)

Which of the following data import tools can import up to 50,000 records at a time, and provides a simple interface to specify the configuration parameters, data sources, and the field mappings that map the field names in your import file with the field names in Salesforce? (Select 1)

Which of the following data import tools can import up to five million records at a time, of any data type, either from files or a database connection, and can be operated either through the user interface or the command line. (Select 1)
Regardless of the data import tool used, the number of records you can import depends which of the following? (Select 3).

answerOptions.describe: The type of data you're importing
They types of objects you're importing
The overall data storage limits for your organization

questions.describe: What type of data import tool would you use if you want to automate the data import process? (Select 1)
You must include universally required fields in your import files or the import will fail.
A folder is a place where you can store which of the following? (Select 3)
What permissions are needed to be able to delete or change a read-only folder? (Select 2)
As a System Administrator, you can edit unfiled and personal folders.
When you share a folder with a group, managers of the group members (above the members in the role hierarchy) have no access to the folder unless those managers are also members of the group. A. True
You cannot cancel an import after it has started processing.
Which is a capability of Chatter files? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Store Chatter posts in a Salesforce Content group
View a list of files shared with a Chatter group
Link a Salesforce Content library to a Chatter profile
Post files from a Salesforce Content library to a Chatter feed

questions.describe: What option is available when scheduling a dashboard refresh?(Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Send a refresh notification to users with access to the dashboard
Schedule the dashboard to refresh in different time zones
Define the refresh times for specific dashboard components
View and remove a scheduled dashboard refresh

questions.describe: Universal Containers wants to ensure that users complete the standard Industry field when creating a new account record. To address this concern, the administrator set the Industry field as required. However, some users are still able to create a new account record without completing the Industry field. What should an administrator do to troubleshoot the issue?(Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Verify the users have the "Edit" permission for accounts on their profiles
Verify the users have the "Modify All Data" permission for accounts on their profiles
Verify the field-level security for the Industry field is not set to "Read Only" on the users' profiles
Verify the Industry field is set as required on all the account page layouts assigned to the users' profiles

questions.describe: What type of record access can an Administrator grant through sharing rules?(Choose 2)
Which functionality is available when enhanced lists are enabled? (choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Create new records from a list view
Calculate the sum of a number field displayed in a list view
Edit dependent picklists inline from a list view
Edit multiple records directly from a list view

questions.describe: What can a marketing user do using the Manage Members button on a campaign record? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Associate existing opportunities with the campaign
Create a custom report including all campaign members
Associate existing contacts with the campaign
Import new leads and associate them with the campaign

questions.describe: What level of access can be set when sharing a document folder with users?(Choose 2)

Universal Containers uses a private sharing model for opportunities. The sales team wants sales engineers to be involved in specific opportunities to help sales representatives close deals faster. How can an administrator meet this request?

answerOptions.describe: Add sales engineers to account teams
Add sales engineers to opportunity teams
Enable Chatter Feed Tracking on opportunities

questions.describe: Sales executives at Universal Containers need to view a chart that displays opportunities grouped by stage and then by region. What chart type can a system administrator use to accomplish this?
What does the controlling field determine when field dependencies are being created?

answerOptions.describe: The values that appear in the dependent field
The dependent fields that appear on a layout
The default value populated in the dependent field
The field-level security for the dependent field

questions.describe: A user receives an error message when attempting to login to Salesforce. What is the first step the Salesforce administrator should take to troubleshoot the problem?
Criteria-based sharing rules can be created for which objects?
Which permission is required to convert a lead? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: "Create" and "Edit" access for leads, accounts, contacts and opportunities
"Transfer" access for leads, accounts, contacts, and opportunities

questions.describe: When using sharing rules, what can records be shared with?(Choose 2)
Universal Containers requires that its Salesforce account data, including attachments, be backed up weekly. Which tool should a system administrator use to accomplish this?
When importing data, what happens if some records do NOT meet the data validation criteria?

answerOptions.describe: Import process ignores the data validation criteria
Import process fails only for the records with invalid data
Import process aborts when it encounters the first invalid record
Import process requires user authorization to import the invalid records
